name: Bubble Popping
description:
The game I made on Scratch, This took me a long time to make, and now I made it offline. Online Version --> https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/650092267/

How To Play:
Pop the bubble to earn points, press the upgrades and level up to get more points more faster. Leveling up gives you points 1x your level. And the king mode unlocks 2 new abilities. Find out what every power does, beat the current high score and unlock king mode. Hover let’s you go over the bubbles and pop them instantly and tap makes you have to click or tap the bubbles to pop them. There is a legendary golden bubble that give 5 times the amount of points, so that means 5x your level! arrow keys for better second player, P to click for second player. The high score resets every Monday, to let you know.
